summary: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau plays an important role in protecting people from unfair, deceptive, and abusive financial practices. This statement for the Congressional Record discusses our CFPB oversight work. Each year since 2011, we've audited and issued an opinion on CFPB's financial statements and related internal controls (e.g., processes to reasonably assure that transactions are properly authorized and recorded). title: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau: Overview of Mission, Structure, and GAO Oversight
